'''Beta 1.16.30.53''' is the fifth [[RenderDragon]] beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.200]], released on September 14, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360049611491|title=Minecraft with RTX Beta - 1.16.30.53 (Windows 10)|date=September 14, 2020}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
'''General '''
* Various performance and stability fixes 
* Fixed the bug causing blue squares to appear on some textures like gravel and grass ({{bug|MCPE-98780}}) 
* Fixed an issue that could cause the screen to appear split up if drivers were out of date ({{bug|MCPE-98683}}) 
* Fixed the bug where unlit torches can emit light</onlyinclude>
